Class BettingCentre

  • java.lang.Object
    • BettingCentre

  • public class BettingCentre
extends java.lang.Object
    The BettingCentre class is a monitor that contains all the necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by the Broker and Spectator.

    This is where the bets are handled.

    Since:
    2018-03-21
